Package com.group5.app

Class RegularReward

java.lang.Object
com.group5.app.GameObject
com.group5.app.RegularReward
public class RegularReward extends GameObject
Inherits GameObject class, assigns with unique ID and loads its image from SpriteSheet.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Marco Lai John Sweeney

  • Constructor Details

    • RegularReward

      public RegularReward(int x, int y, ID id, SpriteSheet ss)
      RegularReward image from SpriteSheet is 32x32pixel Locates sixth column first row in the SpriteSheet.
      Parameters:
      x - position x-coordinate
      y - position y-coordinate
      id - ID of the object
      ss - pass SpriteSheet to load image
      See Also:
      • SpriteSheet
